item.title: 墨西哥 Femsa 任命 Jose Antonio Fernandez Garza-Laguera 为首席执行官
item.description: 墨西哥装瓶商和零售商 Femsa 周三任命何塞-安东尼奥-费尔南德斯-加尔萨-拉格拉（Jose Antonio Fernandez Garza-Laguera）为新任首席执行官，任期从 11 月 1 日开始。【原文：Mexican bottler and retailer Femsa on Wednesday appointed Jose Antonio Fernandez Garza-Laguera as the new chief executive officer, starting on November 1.】

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，华为发布两款新型超级计算人工智能节点
item.description: 据当地媒体《中国星市场》（China Star Market）报道，华为公司副董事长徐直军周四表示，公司计划在今年第四季度推出世界上计算能力最强的节点 Atlas 950。【原文：Huawei's Vice Chairman Eric Xu said on Thursday the company plans to launch the world's most powerful computing power node called the Atlas 950 in the fourth quarter of this year, local media China Star Market reported.】

item.title: 韩国有条件批准阿里巴巴与新世界集团成立合资企业
item.description: 韩国竞争监管机构周四有条件地批准了阿里巴巴国际旗下的阿里速卖通（AliExpress Korea）与当地公司新世界集团（Shinsegae）旗下的一个部门成立合资企业，但提出了对共享客户信息的担忧。【原文：South Korea's competition regulator on Thursday conditionally approved a joint venture between Alibaba International's AliExpress Korea and a unit of local company Shinsegae, but cited concerns over the sharing of customer information.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会在有关 Prime 注册的审判前赢得针对亚马逊的关键裁决
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会声称，零售巨头亚马逊的 Prime 订阅服务违反了消费者保护法，在下周开庭审理之前，法官在几个关键问题上做出了有利于该委员会、不利于亚马逊的裁决。【原文：A judge ruled for the U.S. Federal Trade Commission and against Amazon on several key issues ahead of a trial next week on the agency's claims that the retail giant's Prime subscription practices violated consumer protection law.】

item.title: 诺斯罗普公司与美国国家航空航天局解决货运飞船发动机问题，国际空间站对接定于周四进行
item.description: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）周三晚恢复了诺斯罗普-格鲁曼公司（Northrop Grumman）制造的货运飞船与国际空间站对接的计划，在此之前，NASA已经解决了一个发动机提前关闭的问题，NASA称这是由于飞船软件设置中的一个 "保守保障措施 "造成的。【原文：NASA on Wednesday night resumed plans to dock a Northrop Grumman-built cargo craft with the International Space Station after resolving an early engine-shutdown issue it said was caused by a "conservative safeguard" in the vehicle's software settings.】

item.title: 备忘录称，精神航空将削减 25% 的航班运力并裁员
item.description: 路透社周三看到的一份备忘录显示，精神航空公司将裁员，该公司计划在11月份将运力同比减少25%，这将加深这家低成本航空公司的困境。【原文：Spirit Airlines is set to cut jobs as the airline plans to reduce capacity by 25% year-on-year in November, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Wednesday, deepening woes for the low-budget carrier.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 8 月份就业人数意外下降，失业率保持稳定
item.description: 澳大利亚 8 月份的就业人数意外下降，因为全职职位在前一个月大幅上升后出现回落，而失业率则保持稳定，这表明劳动力市场正在缓慢走软。【原文：Australian employment unexpectedly fell in August as full-time positions dropped back after a sharp rise in the previous month, while the jobless rate held steady in a sign the labour market was slowly softening.】

item.title: 交易员评估美联储降息后的前景，股市和美元走势暂缓
item.description: 美联储降息后，周四全球股市趋于稳定，但在这家全球最大的央行发出进一步放宽货币政策的信号后，投资者仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Global stock markets steadied on Thursday after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates but investors were circumspect after the world's biggest central bank signalled a measured approach to further monetary policy easing.】

item.title: 星展银行、富兰克林邓普顿和瑞波公司合作开展代币化货币市场基金交易
item.description: 星展集团已与美国资产管理公司富兰克林邓普顿（Franklin Templeton）和区块链公司瑞波（Ripple）合作，利用代币化货币市场基金和瑞波的美元稳定币为经认可的机构投资者提供交易和借贷服务。【原文：DBS Group has partnered with U.S. asset manager Franklin Templeton and blockchain firm Ripple to offer accredited and institutional investors trading and lending services using tokenised money market funds and Ripple's U.S. dollar stablecoin.】

item.title: 美联储降息后油价变化不大
item.description: 周四，美国中央银行如市场普遍预期的那样下调了关键利率，而年底前将有更多降息举措的迹象则提升了借贷成本下降刺激需求的前景，此后油价变化不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Thursday after the U.S. central bank lowered its key interest rate as widely expected, while an indication of more rate cuts before year-end raised the prospect of a demand boost spurred by falling borrowing costs.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监察机构称经济型零售商凯马特利用面部识别技术侵犯隐私权
item.description: 澳大利亚监管机构周四称，Wesfarmers 旗下的经济型百货公司凯马特（Kmart）通过面部识别技术系统收集个人敏感信息，以打击退款欺诈行为，从而侵犯了个人隐私。【原文：An Australian regulator has found Wesfarmers' budget department store Kmart breached privacy by collecting personal and sensitive information via a facial recognition technology system designed to combat refund fraud, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 巴西提出吸引数据中心、规范数字竞争的建议
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）周三签署了一项行政命令，旨在通过免除部分相关设备的联邦税来吸引数据中心落户巴西，同时还签署了一项规范数字竞争的法案。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Wednesday signed an executive order aimed at luring data centers to the country by exempting some related equipment from federal taxes, as well a bill to regulate digital competition.】

item.title: 全球顶级肉类加工企业 JBS 为 2026 年屠宰牛数量下降做好准备
item.description: 巴西肉类加工企业 JBS 的一位高管周三表示，该公司已经做好准备，应对巴西养牛周期可能发生的变化，这种变化可能导致明年可供屠宰的牲畜数量减少。【原文：Brazilian meatpacker JBS is prepared for a likely shift in the country's cattle cycle that could lead to reduced availability of animals for slaughter next year, an executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会通过新上市规则为加密货币现货 ETF 铺平道路
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周三投票批准了三家全国性证券交易所提出的规则修改建议，使它们能够对新的加密货币和其他现货商品交易所交易产品采用通用上市标准。【原文：The Securities and Exchange Commission voted on Wednesday to approve proposed rule changes by three national securities exchanges, enabling them to adopt generic listing standards for new cryptocurrency and other spot commodity exchange-traded products.】

item.title: 行业组织称，加征关税后，9月份巴西对美国的牛肉出口将进一步下降
item.description: 巴西牛肉游说团体Abiec负责人周三表示，9月份巴西对美国的牛肉出口将比前几个月进一步下降，此举与唐纳德-特朗普总统对巴西商品征收更高的关税有关。【原文：Brazil's beef exports to the United States are seen falling further in September from the previous months, the head of local beef lobby Abiec said on Wednesday, in a move linked to higher tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump on goods from Brazil.】

item.title: Meta 售价 800 美元的新型智能眼镜（带显示屏）很可能成为 Connect 大会的焦点
item.description: Meta 公司预计将于本周三推出首款内置显示屏的消费级智能眼镜，力图延续其雷朋（Ray-Ban）产品线的发展势头，该产品线是人工智能时代的早期热门消费产品。【原文：Meta is expected to launch on Wednesday its first consumer-ready smart glasses with a built-in display, seeking to extend the momentum of its Ray-Ban line, an early consumer hit of the artificial intelligence era.】

item.title: SiTime 发布面向可穿戴设备的新芯片
item.description: SiTime 周三发布了一款新芯片，旨在帮助其进入一个价值 40 亿美元的市场，并在可穿戴电子设备领域赢得客户。【原文：SiTime on Wednesday released a new chip aimed at helping it enter a $4 billion market and land customers in wearable electronic devices.】

item.title: 米兰的美联储异议引起轰动，但未能左右结果
item.description: 如果说唐纳德-特朗普总统希望让一位亲密盟友加入美联储能成为头条新闻的话，那么白宫经济顾问斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周三的反对意见和远低于共识的利率预测则为他赢得了头条新闻。【原文：If President Donald Trump hoped that putting a close ally at the Federal Reserve would grab headlines, White House economic adviser Stephen Miran's dissent and way-below consensus interest rate projection on Wednesday delivered.】

item.title: 新西兰第二季度经济弱于预期，萎缩 0.9
item.description: 由于美国关税的不确定性加剧以及房地产市场的持续疲软，新西兰第二季度的经济萎缩程度超出预期。【原文：New Zealand's economy shrank more than expected in the second quarter as heightened uncertainty around U.S. tariffs and ongoing weakness in the housing market weighed.】

item.title: 消息人士称，网络安全公司 Netskope 首次公开募股融资 9.08 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，网络安全公司 Netskope 在美国首次公开募股中募集了 9.08 亿美元，股票定价为每股 19 美元，处于市场定价区间的顶端。【原文：Cybersecurity firm Netskope raised $908 million in its U.S. initial public offering, pricing its stock at the top of the marketed range at $19 a share, according to a source familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国广播公司将无限期停播 "吉米-金梅尔现场直播"，因其发表了关于柯克的言论
item.description: 迪斯尼旗下的美国广播公司（ABC）周三表示，将无限期停播 "吉米-基梅尔现场直播 "节目，因为这位深夜节目主持人就查理-柯克遇刺事件发表的言论遭到了美国联邦通信委员会负责人的严厉批评。【原文：Walt Disney-owned ABC said on Wednesday it will indefinitely stop airing "Jimmy Kimmel Live" after remarks the late-night host made about Charlie Kirk's assassination came under harsh criticism from the head of the Federal Communications Commission.】

item.title: 穆迪指出甲骨文近期签订的 3,000 亿美元人工智能合同存在风险
item.description: 美国信用评级机构穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）指出了甲骨文公司最近签署的 3,000 亿美元人工智能合同中的几个潜在风险，但没有对这家软件巨头采取评级行动。【原文：U.S. credit rating agency Moody's Ratings flagged several potential risks in Oracle Corp's $300 billion of recently signed artificial intelligence contracts, but stopped short of taking ratings action against the software giant.】

item.title: 美联储鲍威尔解释央行适度利率授权如何运作
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周三解释了为什么国会强加给央行的三项任务在现实条件下加起来是两项。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Wednesday explained why the three missions Congress imposed on the central bank add up to two in real-world conditions.】

item.title: 高管称美国最繁忙港口已提前迎来假日进口旺季
item.description: 周三，美国最繁忙海港的高层管理人员表示，美国零售商至少提前一个月完成了假日商品的进口，以限制与唐纳德-特朗普总统不断变化的关税政策相关的成本。【原文：U.S. retailers have wrapped up imports of holiday goods at least a month early in a bid to limit costs tied to President Donald Trump's evolving tariff policies, the top executive at the nation's busiest seaport said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国称美国国事访问带来创纪录的 1500 亿英镑投资
item.description: 英国政府周三援引自己的数据称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对英国的国事访问已经带来了1500亿英镑（约合2048.7亿美元）的外来投资。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's state visit to Britain has generated 150 billion pounds ($204.87 billion) of inward investment, the British government said on Wednesday citing its own data which compiled new and previously announced pledges.】

item.title: 业内官员称，特朗普打压 DEI 进一步限制了美国飞机机械师的供应
item.description: 业内官员告诉路透社，由于政府试图从自己的可用拨款通知中删除有关多元化、公平和包容的内容，旨在培训以男性为主的劳动力的资金被搁置，解决美国飞机机械师短缺问题的计划陷入困境。【原文：Plans to combat a U.S. shortage of aircraft mechanics are in limbo after funds aimed at training a mostly male workforce are being held up by government efforts to remove mention of diversity, equity and inclusion from its own notices of available grants, industry officials told Reuters.】

item.title: 美联储降息后美国大银行下调最优惠贷款利率
item.description: 在美联储今年首次降息后，美国主要贷款机构周三下调了一项关键利率，为美国消费者提供了借贷成本方面的缓和措施。【原文：Major U.S. lenders lowered a key interest rate on Wednesday, providing U.S. consumers a reprieve on borrowing costs, after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates for the first time this year.】

item.title: 交易日：美联储减息，市场不知何去何从
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特斯拉重新设计门把手，因安全问题而备受关注
item.description: 特斯拉公司的长期设计总监弗朗茨-冯-霍尔茨豪森（Franz von Holzhausen）周三在彭博新闻播客中表示，特斯拉正在寻求将电子和手动车门释放装置合并，目前这两种装置分别位于不同的位置。【原文：Tesla is looking to combine the electronic and manual door-release mechanisms, which are currently in separate locations, the company's longtime design chief, Franz von Holzhausen, said on a Bloomberg News podcast on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Blackstone 和 TPG 恢复了收购 Hologic 的兴趣
item.description: 一位接近交易的人士周三表示，私募股权投资公司 Blackstone 和 TPG 恢复了对收购医疗设备制造商 Hologic 的兴趣。【原文：Private equity firms Blackstone and TPG revived their interest in acquiring medical device maker Hologic , a person close to the transaction said on Wednesday.】
